alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 11:33AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS POSSIBLE SUNDAY... A wave of low pressure will develop over the Gulf late tonight and track up into the central or southern Panhandle Sunday. Along and south of the track of this low, enhanced southwest wind gusts are likely. At this time there is high uncertainty in regards to the exact track of this low, however wind gusts of up to 50 mph from the southwest will affect some coastal communities from Sitka southward to the west coast of Prince of Wales Island during the day Sunday. As the track and strength of this system becomes more clear, there is the potential for high wind warnings to be posted tonight into Sunday for some portion of the central and southern Gulf coast. Places that are more exposed to southwest wind should make preparations for a period of strong wind gusts Sunday.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Sitka; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
